Title: Relates to veterans health care
Summary: Relates to veterans' health care; creates a veteran health care review to ensure veterans and their families have access to health and mental health treatment, including for post-traumatic stress disorder, depression, anxiety, military sexual trauma, reproductive and mental health conditions, and suicide prevention.
LawCode: Add ยง18-a, Veterans' Services L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the veterans' services law, in relation to veterans health care
